alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 5:33PM MDT until May 01 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL KIOWA AND NORTHERN BENT COUNTIES... At 532 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Hasty, or 25 miles northwest of Lamar, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blue Lake, Hasty, McClave, John Martin Reservoir, Fort Lyon and Caddoa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
